import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; function Register() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', }) const navigate = useNavigate(); let currentState = ''; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:8001/register", values) .then(res => console.log(currentState = res.data.Status)) .then(res => { if(currentState == "success"){ navigate('/login'); } }) .then(err => console.log(err )); } return (

Register

setValues({...values, lastName: e.target.value})} />
setValues({...values, email: e.target.value})} />
setValues({...values, password: e.target.value})} />

); } export default Register;
